import React from 'react'; import Perk from './Perk.js'; import RoomsLeft from './RoomsLeft.js'; import BestsellerFlag from './BestsellerFlag.js'; /* functional component - accepts the data model for a single hotel as a prop - uses that data to render the UI for a single hotel in the list */ var Hotel = props => (

  • {props.hotel.name}

    {props.hotel.rating}
    {props.hotel.reviewCount} reviews
    ${props.hotel.pricePerNight}{' '} per night Includes taxes and charges
    • ); export default Hotel;
